EmailTemplate.name: (ndf) No documents found
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for attempting to upload your verification documents. Unfortunately, the images didn’t upload successfully to our system. Please try to again as soon as you can. You’ll see a green check mark for each category once they’ve been confirmed as uploaded.
If you’re still having issues, please let me know as soon as possible.
Best,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team Verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
